hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Poe Bottle#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Ice Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Left Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Boss Key Loop

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Poe Bottle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

ZD (Mweep).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
